title: A deserving winner
author: VD
content_html:
After all the complaining I did about a certain Nebula novel winner from a few years ago, I need to compliment the Academy for getting it right this year. Lois McMaster Bujold’s THE CURSE OF CHALION is a solid book, entertaining from start to finish and with the added bonus of being one of the few fantasy novels to ever feature a convincing structure of an alternate religion.

Congratulations, Lois!
